xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/adobe_description=Aggregated properties that describe combinations of multiple properties.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/adobe_label=Schema For Adobe Aggregated Properties

xmp_property.name: PhotographicSensitivity
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/adobe/PhotographicSensitivity_description=Indicates the sensitivity of the camera in either ISO, SOS (standard output sensitivity) or REI (recommended exposure index).
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/adobe/PhotographicSensitivity_label=Photographic Sensitivity
